message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $950000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know what you think.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $700000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to make sure it's within my budget.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $700000 is simply too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $850000. This is a fair price that reflects both our interests. Let's work together to make this happen.

I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, so I'll offer $825000. This is my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
